This video and Yoga with Adriene in general has changed my life.
I was doing a youtube workout (one of those 28 day challenges. I won't say who it was.) and in the middle of it, I just felt so... defeated. Like everything I was doing was a competition. And because I was not the best or the strongest or the most conventionally attractive, why bother?
So I was brave and stopped the workout. I stopped punishing myself. I came to this video because I am very anxious and promised myself I would get through this video. It was only 20 minutes-- I could afford to spend 20 minutes on myself. I figured the world probably wouldn't implode.
And I did the video. And ngl, tears were coming out of my eyes. I felt reconnected to myself in a way that I never have. I do not have a good relationship with my body. ... But yoga videos like these remind me that my body is good too. Because it simply is.
